_sText:
This Map Is a Gun Snatch Map, First the the Areas of the map, Vent room, Gun Pit and Pyramid are the best armed for the round.

Each round The players Spawn with a knife to keep Balance.

The Only Buyzone on the game is on the pyramids White block, Make sure if you are running this map you use a buytime that is long enough for players to reach it in time.

The Darkness in this map Ads an Extra layer and all the areas are as balanced as Possible With guns, cover and the cover of Darkness.

Thanks To Stefler, An1mal and Dain for Testing and helping with this map!

.:23:. and Donny = Cheesecake Studio's

Hope you like the Map is this is the very first map i have made. Comments and Constructive Critisms please!
